short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser page search tool with enhanced features

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HighlighterPro is an extension designed to enhance your web browsing experience by allowing you to highlight specific words on any webpage. With HighlighterPro, you can:

* Easily input and manage a list of words or phrases that you want to highlight across any website.

* Choose from a variety of colors to differentiate between various terms, making it easy to categorize and visually separate the highlighted content.

We do not collect, store, or use any of your personal data.

Stay tuned for future updates as we continue to improve and expand HighlighterPro with new features and enhanced functionalities!
